pages.text: Red Grapevine Seed$(br)Can be mostly be found by breaking Tall Grass or rarely by breaking Grass.$(br2)Wandering Winemakers or Winemakers can occassionally sell them from time to time$(br2)You can either plant them directly on moist blocks such as Grass, Podzol, etc. or by placing them on Grapevine Stems.

White Grapevine Seed$(br)Can be mostly be found by breaking Grass or rarely by breaking Tall Grass.$(br2)Wandering Winemakers or Winemakers can occassionally sell them from time to time.$(br2)You can either plant them directly on moist blocks such as Grass, Podzol, etc. or by placing them on Grapevine Stems.
